hero_subtitle: Create and manage memorable experiences with smart guest context.
hero_accessibility_note: Optimized for keyboard navigation, screen readers, and clear field-level feedback.
setup_hint: Create frontend/.env with VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY. Then restart with docker compose down -v && docker compose up --build.
public_coming_title: We are building the best version of LeGoodAnfitrion
public_coming_subtitle: A thoughtful experience to help you become a better host at every event.
public_coming_point_1: Faster and clearer invitations and RSVP flow.
public_coming_point_2: Richer guest profiles to personalize every detail.
public_coming_point_3: Smart suggestions for food, drinks, and atmosphere.
google_auth_error: Could not sign in with Google:
account_created: Account created. If email confirmation is enabled, check your inbox before signing in.
invitation_share_unavailable: Message cannot be generated because RSVP public link is missing.
invitation_bulk_hint: Select multiple guests to create RSVP links in batch for this event.
invitation_bulk_require_selection: Select at least one guest for bulk invitation.
invitation_list_bulk_hint: Select invitations to copy links/messages or delete them in batch.
invitation_share_template: Hi {guest}, I'd like to invite you to "{event}". Date: {date}. Place: {location}. Please RSVP here: {url}
copy_fail: Could not copy automatically. Please copy the link manually.
event_updated_continue_edit: Event updated. You can keep editing it.
guest_created_missing_id_warning: Guest created, but edit mode could not be enabled automatically. Use 'Edit' from the list.
guest_created_continue_edit: Guest created. You can keep editing their advanced profile.
rsvp_note_placeholder: Example: I will arrive 30 minutes late.
rsvp_saved: Your RSVP has been saved. Thank you.
event_title_length: Title must be between 3 and 120 characters.
guest_first_name_length: First name must be between 2 and 80 characters.
guest_social_length: Social profile field cannot exceed 180 characters.
guest_contact_required: Provide at least email or phone.
invitation_select_required: Select both an event and a guest.
invitation_duplicate: This guest already has an invitation for this event.
multi_select_hint: Select multiple options with Ctrl/Cmd, or tap multiple options on mobile.
help_event_form: Define core event details to start coordinating guests and smart suggestions.
event_status_help: You can keep it in draft and publish it when your invitation is ready.
help_guest_form: Add trusted contacts and baseline preferences to improve personalization.
guest_host_potential_hint: Any guest with email or phone can become a potential host and create their own events.
help_invitation_form: Generate a public link so guests can RSVP without registering.
contact_import_hint: Bulk import from CSV/VCF or paste lines with format: Full Name | email | phone | city | country.
contact_import_device_supported: Your browser supports selecting contacts from the device.
contact_import_device_not_supported: Direct contact picker is not available in this browser. Use CSV/VCF or paste.
contact_import_device_error: Could not load contacts from device:
contact_import_single_loaded: Contact loaded into the form. Review and save the guest.
contact_import_mobile_quick_hint: Select 1 contact and we auto-fill name, phone, email, and address.
contact_import_mobile_quick_fallback: Your browser cannot access contacts directly. Use CSV/VCF import.
contact_import_no_ready: No contacts are ready to import.
host_converted_match_email: Detected as a registered user by email.
host_converted_match_phone: Detected as a registered user by phone.
host_converted_match_google: Detected as a registered user via Google.
host_profile_hint: Edit your base data and sync it as a guest profile to improve suggestions and conversion.
host_profile_email_readonly: Email comes from your account and is used to detect conversions.
host_profile_sync_hint: When saving, your guest card in your own list is also updated (or created).
host_profile_saved: Profile saved and guest card synchronized.
host_profile_saved_guest_sync_warning: Profile saved, but there was a problem syncing your guest card:
hint_invitation_public: You can share the RSVP link via WhatsApp, email, or social media.
invitation_guest_tag_hint: Guests already invited to this event are shown as disabled.
invitation_all_guests_already_invited: All guests already have an invitation for this event.
invitation_guest_already_invited_selecte: That guest already has an invitation for this event.
hint_accessibility: All fields include labels and contextual hints for better usability.
guest_advanced_hint: This section improves automatic suggestions for menu, drinks, ambience, and conversation.
field_sensitive_consent: I have consent to store sensitive data for this guest
guest_sensitive_consent_hint: Required to store allergies and intolerances (GDPR).
guest_sensitive_consent_required: You must confirm consent to store allergies/intolerances.
guest_saved_partial_warning: Guest saved, but part of the advanced profile could not be saved:
workspace_events_latest_desc: Review and manage your recent events.
workspace_events_detail_desc: Open the full event profile with map and guests in read-only mode.
workspace_guests_latest_desc: Browse and update your latest guests.
workspace_guests_detail_desc: Open the full guest profile and invitation history.
workspace_invitations_latest_desc: Manage RSVP links and response states.
delete_event_confirm: The event and related invitations will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
delete_guest_confirm: The guest and related invitations will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
delete_invitation_confirm: The selected invitation will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
delete_invitations_confirm: Selected invitations will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
search_events_placeholder: Search by title, type, or address...
search_invitations_placeholder: Search by event, guest, or status...
growth_analytics_hint: Track guest conversion with funnel, sources, and recent trend.
growth_trend_14d_label: Conversion trend for the last 14 days
overview_hero_subtitle: Quick snapshot to decide your next action in seconds.
overview_next_event_empty: You have no upcoming events with a defined date.
overview_help: Use the menu to move through screens and complete the host flow in a clear order.
content_translation_note: Important: catalog fields (diet, allergies, punctuality, etc.) are shown translated; free text remains in its original language.
address_google_hint: Type 4+ characters and select a valid suggestion from Google Maps.
address_google_unconfigured: Google Maps validator is disabled. Configure VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY to enable it.
address_select_suggestion_required: Select an address suggested by Google Maps to validate the event.
smart_hosting_hint: Automatic recommendations based on guest preferences, allergies, and latest interactions.
smart_hosting_scope_event: Only guests invited to this event
smart_hosting_timing_buffer: Add a 15-20 minute buffer due to flexible punctuality.
smart_hosting_timing_on_time: You can run a more punctual schedule.
smart_hosting_empty: Not enough data yet for suggestions. Complete guest profiles or create invitations.
event_detail_hint: Read-only view with all key event data and RSVP status.
event_detail_no_invites: This event has no invitations yet.
event_detail_rsvp_timeline_empty: No RSVP activity yet for this event.
event_detail_alerts_empty: No health alerts detected for this event.
guest_detail_hint: Review profile, preferences, and invitation history without editing.
guest_detail_no_profile_data: This guest does not have enough advanced profile data yet.
guest_detail_recommendations_hint: Quick suggestions for food, drinks, ambience, and conversation.
guest_detail_no_invitations: This guest has not been invited to any events yet.
invitation_prefill_event: Invitation form prefilled with this event.
invitation_prefill_guest: Invitation form prefilled with this guest.
event_templates_hint: Apply a starting point to speed up creation and then customize it.
event_phase_publish_hint: Before publishing, review status, validated address, and guest list.
event_phase_publish_after_save: After saving the event, you can create invitations and keep editing.
invitation_recommendation_hint: Quick checklist to avoid host mistakes.
invitation_recommendation_experience_mis: This event type does not match their preferred experiences.
invitation_recommendation_empty: There is not enough advanced profile data for this guest yet.
